snippet: Britain and Iran announced they would each appoint a chargé d’affaires, a step below ambassador, to work toward resuming full diplomatic ties, including reopening embassies.
abstract: Britain and Iran say that they will each appoint a charge d'affaires to work toward resuming full diplomatic ties between countries, in effort to repair long-strained relations;  diplomats will remain in their own countries, but will discuss reopening embassies in London and Tehran.
lead_paragraph: Britain and Iran announced they would each appoint a chargé d’affaires, a step below ambassador, to work toward resuming full diplomatic ties, including reopening embassies.

headline.main: Britain and Iran Move to Repair Diplomatic Relations
headline.print_headline: Effort by Iran And Britain To Repair Ties
